result.reason: The default setting 'RdpLoadBalanceInfoUseUtf8=True' forces Azure-specific encoding on standard 'tsv://' LoadBalanceInfo strings, causing RDP internal errors for Connection Brokers.
result.approach: Modify 'SetLoadBalanceInfo' in 'RdpProtocol.cs' to automatically bypass 'AzureLoadBalanceInfoEncoder' when the LoadBalanceInfo string starts with 'tsv://', regardless of the global preference.
